name: Andrzej Ito
profile_summary: As a Senior Android Platform Engineer with over 9 years of experience, I specialize in developing scalable software solutions using **C++**, **Kotlin**, and **Android AOSP**. My expertise also extends to **Embedded Linux**, **Automotive ECUs**, and various automotive communication protocols such as **CAN**, **LIN**, and **Automotive Ethernet**. I possess strong skills in system-level debugging, embedded systems development, and implementing **Android Automotive OS**. Furthermore, I am knowledgeable in **virtualization technologies** and **hypervisors**, facilitating seamless **Over-the-Air (OTA) updates** and ensuring **embedded systems security principles** are adhered to alongside **automotive functional safety standards**. I excel in leading cross-functional teams, mentoring junior engineers, and delivering impactful projects that prioritize user experience, performance, and innovation while enhancing accessibility and driving technical excellence.
